articles.title: American football icon John Madden dies aged 85 - TheJournal.ie
articles.description: He was also known for lending his name to the Madden NFL series of video games.
articles.content:
JOHN MADDEN, THE Super-Bowl-winning former coach and high-profile broadcaster, has died at the age of 85.

articles.title: American Civil War artefacts recovered after 130-year-old time capsule opened up - 9News
articles.description: Conservation experts in Virginia’s capital on Tuesday pulled books, money, ammunition, documents and other artefacts from a time capsule found in the remnants of a pedestal that once held a statue of Confederate Gen. Robert E. Lee
